languages.text: "Готов поклясться в том же. Видать, Император защитил". {n}Блюститель осторожно касается свежей раны, и на его пальцах остается поблескивающий гной. Свежая рана не могла воспалиться так быстро. Присмотревшись, вы видите в блеске сукровицы отчетливые знаки — нечистота, которую вы допустили в этот отсек, уже прицепилась к этому бойцу и поделилась с ним своими дарами.{/n}

"I could swear the same. I suppose the Emperor's protected me." {n}He touches one of his fresh wounds cautiously. Glistening pus remains on his fingers. A fresh wound could not have taken this little to fester. As you look closer, you notice clear signs in the wound's ooze. The foulness you let into this bay has already latched onto Klein and shared its gifts with him.{/n}

languages.text: "Das könnte ich auch. Ich schätze, der Imperator hat mich beschützt." {n}Er betastet vorsichtig eine seiner frischen Wunden. An seinen Fingern bleibt zäher Eiter zurück. Eine frische Wunde kann niemals so schnell eitern. Bei näherer Betrachtung erkennst du in der Wunde eindeutige Zeichen. Die Fäule, die du in dieses Modul gelassen hast, hat Klein bereits befallen und ihre Gaben mit ihm geteilt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could swear the same. I suppose the Emperor's protected me." {n}He touches one of his fresh wounds cautiously. Glistening pus remains on his fingers. A fresh wound could not have taken this little to fester. As you look closer, you notice clear signs in the wound's ooze. The foulness you let into this bay has already latched onto Klein and shared its gifts with him.{/n}

Eine frische Wunde kann niemals so schnell eitern. Bei näherer Betrachtung erkennst du in der Wunde eindeutige Zeichen. Die Fäule, die du in dieses Modul gelassen hast, hat Klein bereits befallen und ihre Gaben mit ihm geteilt.{/n}

languages.text: « Je pourrais jurer la même chose. J'imagine que l'Empereur veille sur moi, » {n}dit-il en touchant prudemment l'une de ses blessures récentes et maculant ses doigts de pus luisant. Une nouvelle blessure n'aurait pas dû se mettre à suppurer si rapidement. En l'examinant de plus près, vous remarquez des signes qui ne trompent pas dans le suintement de la plaie. La souillure que vous avez laissée s'introduire dans cette baie s'est déjà saisie de Klein et partage désormais ses dons avec lui.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could swear the same. I suppose the Emperor's protected me." {n}He touches one of his fresh wounds cautiously. Glistening pus remains on his fingers. A fresh wound could not have taken this little to fester. As you look closer, you notice clear signs in the wound's ooze. The foulness you let into this bay has already latched onto Klein and shared its gifts with him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je pourrais jurer la même chose. J'imagine que l'Empereur veille sur moi, {n}dit-il en touchant prudemment l'une de ses blessures récentes et maculant ses doigts de pus luisant. Une nouvelle blessure n'aurait pas dû se mettre à suppurer si rapidement. En l'examinant de plus près, vous remarquez des signes qui ne trompent pas dans le suintement de la plaie. La souillure que vous avez laissée s'introduire dans cette baie s'est déjà saisie de Klein et partage désormais ses dons avec lui.{/n}

languages.text: «Y yo habría jurado lo mismo. Supongo que el Emperador me ha protegido». {n}Se toca una de las heridas frescas con cuidado. Un pus brillante queda en sus dedos. Una herida reciente no puede supurar en tan poco tiempo. Al mirar más de cerca, notas señales claras en la mucosa de la herida. La inmundicia que has dejado entrar en la bahía ya ha llegado a Klein, compartiendo sus dones con él.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could swear the same. I suppose the Emperor's protected me." {n}He touches one of his fresh wounds cautiously. Glistening pus remains on his fingers. A fresh wound could not have taken this little to fester. As you look closer, you notice clear signs in the wound's ooze. The foulness you let into this bay has already latched onto Klein and shared its gifts with him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Y yo habría jurado lo mismo. Supongo que el Emperador me ha protegido». {n}Se toca una de las heridas frescas con cuidado. Un pus brillante queda en sus dedos. Una herida reciente no puede supurar en tan poco tiempo. Al mirar más de cerca, notas señales claras en la mucosa de la herida. La inmundicia que has dejado entrar en la bahía ya ha llegado a Klein, compartiendo sus dones con él.{/n}

languages.text: 「私も同じです。皇帝がお守りくださったのでしょう」{n}彼は新たな傷のひとつに慎重に触れる。指にはキラキラ光る膿が残っている。生傷がここまで可能することはないだろう。よく見れば、傷の滲出液には明らかな兆候がある。あなたがこのベイに持ち込んだ汚物がすでにクラインに取りついており、その産物を彼に与えていたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could swear the same. I suppose the Emperor's protected me." {n}He touches one of his fresh wounds cautiously. Glistening pus remains on his fingers. A fresh wound could not have taken this little to fester. As you look closer, you notice clear signs in the wound's ooze. The foulness you let into this bay has already latched onto Klein and shared its gifts with him.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私も同じです。皇帝がお守りくださったのでしょう」{n}彼は新たな傷のひとつに慎重に触れる。指にはキラキラ光る膿が残っている。生傷がここまで可能することはないだろう。よく見れば、傷の滲出液には明らかな兆候がある。あなたがこのベイに持ち込んだ汚物がすでにクラインに取りついており、その産物を彼に与えていたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: “我也可以这么发誓，看来是帝皇保护了我。”{n}他小心翼翼地触摸着新的伤口。他的手指上残留着闪闪发光的脓液，这么小的伤口绝对不可能化脓。当你仔细观察时，你注意到伤口渗出液中有着明显的腐化痕迹。你带入这片甲板的污秽之物已经感染了克莱因，将它的礼物赐予了他。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could swear the same. I suppose the Emperor's protected me." {n}He touches one of his fresh wounds cautiously. Glistening pus remains on his fingers. A fresh wound could not have taken this little to fester. As you look closer, you notice clear signs in the wound's ooze. The foulness you let into this bay has already latched onto Klein and shared its gifts with him.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben de. İmparator korumuş olsa gerek." {n}Taze yaralarından birine dikkatlice dokunuyor. Parlak iltihap parmağına bulaşıyor. Böylesi taze yaralar, bu kadar kısa süre içinde iltihaplanmış olamaz. Daha yakından baktığında yaradan sızan iltihabın açıkça semboller oluşturduğunu görüyorsun. Bu bölmeyi işgal etmesine göz yumduğun musibet, Klein'ın vücuduna tutunmuş ve lütuflarını onunla paylaşmış bile.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I could swear the same. I suppose the Emperor's protected me." {n}He touches one of his fresh wounds cautiously. Glistening pus remains on his fingers. A fresh wound could not have taken this little to fester. As you look closer, you notice clear signs in the wound's ooze. The foulness you let into this bay has already latched onto Klein and shared its gifts with him.{/n}
